title: help i was hacked
body:
ok so this happened a couple of days ago but it did not let me log onto the forums it just kept gaving me an error and when I go to support it gets suck on the loading screeen. But someone has been playing on my account and they played varus draven and stuff, what do I do? I changed my password

http://prnt.sc/ex7yz2

also all support pages are showing unsafe for me like this:

http://prntscr.com/eyjter

replies.body: Anytime you think your account might have been compromised, your best bet would be to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). That way we'll be able to go over your information one on one and get your account secured again.
